text: The 1967–68 Serie A season was won by Milan. ==Teams== Sampdoria and Varese had been promoted from Serie B. ==Final classification== ==Results== ==Top goalscorers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank ! Player ! Club !
